attributes.action: Allow workers to be able to claim fuel allowance like MP's
attributes.background: I live in a sparsely populated area and work part time from 7:45pm until 00:15 am Monday to Thursday and from 5:15pm until 00:15 am on a Sunday so have no chance of using public transport

rejection.details: Decisions about the kinds of expenses that employees can claim are made by individual employers, not by the Government or Parliament.
